snippet.title: Loot & Legends (by DropForge Limited) - rpg game for android - gameplay.
snippet.description:
An epic tale of Adventure, Glory and Pizza! Take a trip to a time when battles were set atop tables and magic was limited only by your imagination! Collect powerful cards to crush your competition in an immersive cardboard universe!

Forged from the award-winning PC game Card Hunter and designed with Richard Garfield, creator of Magic: The Gathering, Loot & Legends takes you on a hilarious journey filled with pop culture, sibling rivalry, and pizza delivery romance!

• OUTWIT YOUR ENEMIES!
Use your immensely superior intellect to prove yourself in board game style combat!

• EXPLORE A HAND-CRAFTED WORLD!
Unlock rare cards to level up your deck and progress through increasingly challenging battles!

• COLLECT EPIC LOOT!
Unearth unique sets of armor and abilities to bring your heroes to the next level and defeat Big Bad Bosses!

Shuffle your deck, build your team... LIVE THE DREAM!

A network connection is required to play Loot & Legends. Please note that this game is optimized for Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 and Google Nexus 9.


Google Play download URL:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.dropforge.lootandlegends
(the game is deleted from GP)


Alternative download URL:
https://www.apkmonk.com/app/air.com.dropforge.lootandlegends/
